message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the fact that the money loses value for both of us over time, but at a faster rate for me.
Let's split it evenly.  This way we both get a fair share before the money loses too much value.
I understand you want an even split, but the declining value puts me at a greater disadvantage. This offer is a compromise, slightly favoring me to account for the faster inflation I face.
I think we both need to compromise a little more to make this work.  I'm willing to give you a bit less this time, but I hope you'll consider accepting this to avoid further losses.
Bob, we're running out of time and losing money. I'm sticking to a slight advantage for myself due to the inflation difference, but this offer is closer to your previous one. Let's settle this now.
